# Your Workplace Engagement Hub
Engage employees across your organization with events and communities. Give your workplace purpose, build human connection, and increase cross-collaboration — all in one place
[Get Started for Free](https://at.cafe/</contact-sales>)

## The ultimate connectivity hub
Café helps you connect every individual across your organization.
[Without Café](https://at.cafe/<#>)[With Café](https://at.cafe/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634966cf9b593373e36310db_quote-black.svg)
High employee belonging can lead to a 56% increase in job performance
Harvard Business Review - "The Value of Belonging at Work"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/636009be3a7b2ab956fbb31c_1%20-%20backgroud.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/636009cf38a81bdbd4bbb4ba_1%20-%20highlight.webp)
## Connect people beyond their teams
Café gives everyone opportunities to create social ties within the organization. Unlock creativity, encourage collaboration, and rebuild global cohesion.
[**More about Communities**](https://at.cafe/</product/community>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/636009ee49028339d3390840_2%20-%20backgroud.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/6356c62e36525668bdce4afa_2%20-%20highlight.png)
# The answer to“Who’s where?”
## The answer to “who’s where?”
Help people connect and meet up with their peers, on their terms. At the office, in coworking spaces, or even in cafés: allow people to discover where they work best.
[**More about Space Booking**](https://at.cafe/</product/workplace>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/66339f6cc5b5a141f5658b62_landing1%3A2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/63653debc6c50a9725e19951_3%20-%20highlight.png)
## Just meet, intentionally
Enable individuals to connect serendipitously with people from different teams, based on their interests and location. Own the experience and self-initiate meetups with your community.
[**More about Events**](https://at.cafe/</product/events>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/63600958b9248cc865afc542_1.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/6360096db9248c552aafc68c_1.webp)
## Connected to your toolkit
Café isn’t a stand alone app: we provide all the context you need within your daily tools.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/63600ab43484be602b17011a_1.webp)
‍[**More about Integrations**](https://at.cafe/</features/integrations>)
## How to do organized hybrid, in 60 seconds
[![Open youtube video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/624da2ef2de6dd5a6f55952f_play.svg)](https://at.cafe/<https:/youtube.com/watch?v=y3tC1HV32pU>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634966cf9b593373e36310db_quote-black.svg)
**Building strong connections across your org can help to drop up to** 50% in turnover risks
Harvard Business Review - "The Value of Belonging at Work"
## **Designed with industry leaders**
![Nellie Hayat](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/634abedf90db01632450bce9_nellie.png)
#### Nellie Hayat
Workplace Transformation Leader (ex-**Stripe**)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634966cf9b593373e36310db_quote-black.svg)
It's the only tool that makes **flexible teams** work. Never miss out on what's up in the office so you make the **best out of your time.**
![Sara Escobar](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/634abf765cb8ac065eec8d3b_sarah.png)
#### Sara Escobar
Global Head ofWorkplace at **Riot Games‍**(ex-**Netflix**)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634966cf9b593373e36310db_quote-black.svg)
The tool every company needs to facilitate **relationship building** and collaboration in the new world of work
[Read more about us](https://at.cafe/<https:/at.cafe/about>)
## See the benefits of using Café
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/658ae8f2064f44f8e8402568_0%20-%20employees.png) Increase Productivity](https://at.cafe/</use-cases/increase-productivity>)

## Users talk about Café
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/63493e75bfd0816ce9636f7d_quote.svg)
[Café was instrumental in our transitioning to a hybrid organization. It was super simple to set up and all our teammates adopted the app from day one.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/617a607a58ad2ce7db5d9900_avatar.png)Jacques-Edouard SabatierCo-founder & CEO @JOW](https://at.cafe/</customer-stories/jow-work-from-anywhere>)
[The adoption was quick and easy. Say goodbye to the multiple conversations on Slack - we saved time and gained visibility!![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/617a5f6d448bb1b5a5c94561_avatar.png)Aurélie de Raphélis SoissanHead of People @Gymlib](https://at.cafe/</customer-stories/gymlib-5-steps-to-an-inclusive-hybrid-work-experience>)

## Reliable. Secure. Compliant.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634abbcd3e23cc27afc0df16_folder.webp)
### Access with Single Sign-On
Give employees access through your identity provider using SAML-based single sign-on (SSO).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634abd81c8b9e279f07e25e9_support.webp)
### Always-on 24/7 Support
Morning, noon, or night our support team's logged on. Have a question? We'll be there to answer it.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634abd6629d4e1c48455d6be_privacy.webp)
### GDPR Compliance
We’re compliant with GDPR and privacy laws, rest assured that you’re doing things the right way.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634abd8cc8b9e2f5b87e260d_security.webp)
### SOC 2 Type 2 Certified
Café is secured with encrypted data and industry-standard security frameworks.

## Connect people beyond their teams

# The answer to“Who’s where?”
## The answer to “who’s where?”
Help people connect and meet up with their peers, on their terms. At the office, in coworking spaces, or even in cafés: allow people to discover where they work best.
**More about Space Booking**⟨8⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/66339f6cc5b5a141f5658b62_landing1%3A2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/63653debc6c50a9725e19951_3%20-%20highlight.png)
## Just meet, intentionally
Enable individuals to connect serendipitously with people from different teams, based on their interests and location. Own the experience and self-initiate meetups with your community.
**More about Events**⟨12⟩
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/63600958b9248cc865afc542_1.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/6360096db9248c552aafc68c_1.webp)
## Connected to your toolkit
Café isn’t a stand alone app: we provide all the context you need within your daily tools.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a48750fc14d1f55cfef76/63600ab43484be602b17011a_1.webp)

### Access with Single Sign-On
Give employees access through your identity provider using SAML-based single sign-on (SSO).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634abd81c8b9e279f07e25e9_support.webp)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/617a37a60fc14dbdd8cf9590/634abd6629d4e1c48455d6be_privacy.webp)
### GDPR Compliance
We’re compliant with GDPR and privacy laws, rest assured that you’re doing things the right way.

Café is secured with encrypted data and industry-standard security frameworks.

generated_description:
**Café**: Your Workplace Engagement Hub

Founded in 2020 and hailing from Paris, Café is a vibrant startup that aims to connect teams within organizations through meaningful interactions. Picture a space designed to foster human connections, give purpose to your workplace, and boost collaboration, all packaged in one seamless hub. This journey began in Y Combinator's S21 batch, and they’ve steadily gained traction since then.

### What They Do
Café is essentially about engagement. They provide a suite of tools designed to facilitate internal communication, community-building, event management, and employee engagement tracking. Here’s a quick breakdown of their offerings:

- **Café Community**: Connects individuals to groups across your organization, enhancing social ties and fostering camaraderie.
- **Café Workplace**: Simplifies the experience of booking spaces and scheduling, making it easy for teams to find conducive meeting environments.
- **Café Events**: Streamlines event communication and insights, ensuring everyone is in the loop.
- **Café Pulse**: Keeps a pulse on employee engagement through recurring surveys, helping organizations understand their workforce better.

### Noteworthy Partners
Café recently partnered with Slack, marking a significant milestone in their journey. They also operate as part of a network of larger firms crafting modern workplaces that prioritize people-first cultures, such as Capgemini and Volkswagen.

### Core Values and Approach
With a team of just six, Café champions the idea that high employee belonging correlates with increased job performance—56% improvements, in fact, according to the Harvard Business Review. Their ethos revolves around enhancing productivity and cross-collaboration while simultaneously cultivating an inclusive workplace environment.

### The Takeaway
Café isn't just another app; it's a full-fledged engagement platform designed to address the modern organizational challenges of connectivity and collaboration in an increasingly hybrid work environment. The focus isn’t on simply tools, but rather on building community—a necessity in today’s fragmented workplaces. 

So if you're on a mission to connect your teams and energize your workplace culture, Café might just be the hub you’re looking for.
